Class PasswordValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stormpath.service.PasswordValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validator

    public class PasswordValidator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Validator
    Password validation class which contains all validation operations
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    weipengbian

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      PasswordValidator() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean validate(PasswordRuleMgr mgr, java.lang.String password)
      This is a validation method when temporary customization rules required For example, if you need to used your own rule set X, you can clear all rules in PasswordRuleMgr mgr, and add rule set X to mgr and validate against this rule manager and password
      boolean validate(java.lang.String password)
      This is a validation method used with default rules in properties file
      boolean validateCustom(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.String password)
      This validation method is used to add more complication rules which defined as "custom" in rule properties file

      • validate

        public boolean validate(PasswordRuleMgr mgr,
               java.lang.String password)
        This is a validation method when temporary customization rules required For example, if you need to used your own rule set X, you can clear all rules in PasswordRuleMgr mgr, and add rule set X to mgr and validate against this rule manager and password
        Parameters:
        PasswordRuleMgr - mgr
        String - password
        Returns:
        boolean
